history.proof: intros A R. unfold Monotonic. qsimpl time: 5 use: subrel. qsimpl time: 5 use: subrel. qsimpl time: 5 use: Transport,impl,subrel. qsimpl time: 5 use: Transport,impl,subrel. intros a1 a2 Ha. qsimpl time: 5 use: impl,bool,Transport,arrow_pointwise_subrel,subrel.

exceptions.tactic: intros b x y x' y' H1 H2 H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: The reference b was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply (arrow_pointwise_subrel bool A A R (- ==> R)%type).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type R : rel A A X, X0, X3 : rel (rel A A) (rel A A) X4 : rel (rel A A) (rel A A) H : rel A A -> Prop -> Prop -> Prop a1 : bool a2, Ha : A The term "bool" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "rel ?B1 ?B2".

original: intros A R. unfold Monotonic. intros b x y x' y' H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold subrel in H1. unfold subrel in H2. unfold Transport, impl in H3. unfold Transport, impl in H4. intros a1 a2 Ha. destruct b; simpl in *. - apply (arrow_pointwise_subrel bool A A R (- ==> R)%type). apply H1. - apply (arrow_pointwise_subrel bool A A R (- ==> R)%type). apply H2.
